AI Description: CESM-DEPS is a set of dependencies and tools for supporting the Community Earth System Model (CESM) software. It includes various libraries, compilers, and software packages necessary for running CESM simulations.
Core Features: Provides Essential Dependencies & Tools For Cesm Software, Includes Libraries, Compilers, & Other Software Required For Cesm Simulations, Ensures Smooth Operation & Performance Optimization Of Cesm Models
General Tags: Dependencies, Cesm, Earth System Model, Simulation, Software Package
